ocean.question: I swim in the sea and have big fins. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live in the water.
🐟 I am a type of sea creature.
🏊 I move very fast in the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a big home under the sea, made of many tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 Many colorful fish live inside me.
🧱 I'm hard and can be many colors.
☀️ I'm found in warm, sunny waters.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the sand and pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have a shell.
🚶 I don't walk forward like you.
🌊 You can find me on the beach near the water.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue. Boats can sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 Whales swim in me.
🚢 I am very, very wide.
💧I am made of salty water.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can change colors!
🖐️ I have many arms to help me grab things.
🪨 I live in caves underwater.

ocean.question: I am a small, shiny shell you can find on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be someone's home.
👂 You can hold me to your ear and hear the ocean.
🏖️ I'm often found near the water, buried in the sand.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with very sharp teeth. Be careful when I swim by!

hints.text: 🦈 I'm a predator, which means I hunt other fish.
🦷 My teeth help me catch my food.
🌊 Some people are afraid of me.

ocean.question: I'm a plant that grows in the ocean. Fish like to hide in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I'm green and wavy.
🐠 Little fish like to swim around in me.
🌊 I grow underwater, but I'm not an animal.

ocean.question: I have a shell on my back, and I swim very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to eat plants.
🐌 I take my home everywhere I go.
☀️ I like to swim in the warm ocean.

ocean.question: I jump and play in the ocean, and I am very smart. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I make clicking sounds to talk to my friends.
⚽ People sometimes swim with me and play with me
🌊 I am a mammal, but I live in the sea.

animal.question: I say "Meow!" and like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈‍⬛ People keep me as a pet

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I live in a kennel
🎾 I like to play fetch

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat weeds.
🦆 I have feathers.
🥚 My baby is a duckling

animal.question: I oink and roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I am often pink.
🌽 I eat corn.
🐖 I live on a farm

animal.question: I moo and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I live on a farm.
🌱 I eat grass.
⚫️ I often have black and white spots.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love peanuts.
🐘 I am big and grey.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots.
🌿 I eat leaves high up.
⬆️ I'm taller than a kangaroo.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🙊 I like to make silly faces.
🌴 I can move through trees very quickly.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I like to eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse but with stripes.
🌍 I roam the plains of Africa.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
👑 I am a big cat.
🥩 I eat meat
